data.title: What to Expect at Solutions Review’s Spotlight with Paessler on April 23
data.meta_description: Solutions Review’s Solution Spotlight with Paessler is an hour-long discussion focusing on the benefits of SLA monitoring for network uptime.
data.meta_site_name: Best Network Monitoring Vendors, Software, Tools and Performance Solutions
data.text:
Solutions Review’s Solution Spotlight with Paessler is an hour-long discussion and software demo focusing on the benefits of SLA monitoring for network uptime.

What is a Solutions Spotlight?

Solutions Review’s Solution Spotlights are exclusive webinar events for industry professionals across enterprise technology. Since its first virtual event in June 2020, Solutions Review has expanded its multimedia capabilities in response to the overwhelming demand for these kinds of events. Solutions Review’s current menu of online offerings includes the Demo Day, Solution Spotlight, best practices or case study webinars, and panel discussions. And the best part about the “Spotlight” series? They are free to attend!

Why You Should Attend

Solutions Review is one of the largest communities of IT executives, directors, and decision-makers across enterprise technology marketplaces. Every year, over 10 million people come to Solutions Review’s collection of sites for the latest news, best practices, and insights into solving some of their most complex problems.

With the next Solutions Spotlight event, the team at Solutions Review has partnered with network monitoring solutions provider Paessler. Join Senior Technical Advisor Thomas Wächter and Senior IT Specialist Libor Smyček as they demonstrate how to define, configure, and monitor SLAs in Paessler PRTG and how to optimize compliance with comprehensive reporting in PRTG SLA Reporter.

Featured Speakers:

Thomas Wächter, Senior Technical Advisor

Thomas Wächter is the Senior Technical Advisor at Paessler Solutions. He aims to help businesses get the most out of their IT infrastructure, especially when it comes to maximizing network uptime. He studied electrical engineering at the University of Stuttgart and is an ISSECO certified professional in secure software engineering. He is also a certified Project Management specialist. Thomas was CEO of Swiss-based ITPS before it was acquired by Paessler AG in 2023.

Libor Smyček, Senior IT Specialist

Libor Smyček has been working as an IT Specialist and location manager for over 13 years. His main focus and expertise is in databases, system administration and monitoring. He was involved in multiple software development projects as a consultant and developer. Libor graduated with a bachelor’s degree in information technology at Brno University of Technology. He builds mechanical and electrical puzzle boxes as a hobby.

About Paessler:

Founded in 1997, Paessler is a German-based network monitoring provider with a focus on infrastructure monitoring. Its PRTG network monitor product offers fault and flow analysis, packet sniffing, and more. Paessler has continued to release a consistent stream of vendor-agnostic network monitoring sensors for PRTG as well. The solution features unified monitoring, with its powerful dashboard giving network administrators end-to-end visibility of their entire IT suite at all times. Today, more than 500,000 users in over 170 countries rely on PRTG and other Paessler solutions to monitor their complex IT, OT and IoT infrastructures.

FAQ

What: The Benefits of SLA Monitoring of Network Uptime

When: Tuesday, April 23, 2024 at 11:00pm Eastern Time

Where: Zoom meeting (see registration page for more details)
